features: SENSITIVE SKIN APPROVED: Hydrating, Moisturizing formula that keeps the intimate area hydrated and free from irritation.

CREATED FOR AND BY A WOMAN: With the busy lives we lead as women this product is small enough to fit in your purse and safe enough to use daily. Great for after a workout or directly out of the shower.
FRAGRANCE FREE: Absolutely no harsh fragrances, dyes, parabens, dioxins or sulfates. Unscented, all-natural product
NO MORE IRRITATION: Keeping you feeling refreshed and calm all day long, no irritating ingrediants, dyes or chemicals.
ALL NATURAL: Hydrating Aloe Vera, Apple cider vinegar, probiotics and silver for overall protection

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Her Secret Garden is a woman-owned plant-based feminine hygiene brand. Based in the USA, we are all about empowerment, self-care, self-love, and creating safe spaces for women to be and grow. Her Secret Garden was started out of a need to help women heal on a more spiritual level. We utilize herbs and all-natural oils and ingredients to help women stay balanced, moisturized, and renewed during their most intimate time of self-care. Our products were created to awaken feminine energy and bring you back to self-love and self-awareness. We are dedicated to uplifting all our sisters all around the world!

Happy Yoni plant-based feminine oil is a natural and gentle oil blend designed specifically for the delicate area of the female body. This unique formula is made 100% pure and plant-based ingredients that work to nourish, soothe and protect the intimate area. The ingredients in this oil include a blend of nourishing and moisturizing oils such as coconut oil, grapeseed oil and neem oil as well as natural extracts from herbs like lemongrass, tea tree and red raspberry leaf. The gentle formula of Happy Yoni oil is perfect for daily use. Simply apply a small amount to the external genital area after showering or bathing, or as needed for comfort and hydration. The oil is light and non-greasy and absorbs quickly into the skin for a comfortable and silky-smooth feel. We use only the purest plant-based ingredients, including aloe vera, apple cider vinegar, chamomile, and probiotics which soothe and nourish the skin. Our yoni wash is free from harsh chemicals making it safe and gentle for daily use. Experience the benefits of a natural, hydrating feminine wash that promotes your intimate health and hygiene. Our yoni wash is the perfect addition to your daily self-care routine, leaving you feeling fresh, clean, and confident all day. Our plant-based feminine Balancing spray is gentle and helps to maintain a healthy balance. Made with natural ingredients including aloe vera, probiotics, silver, and b12, this spray is a safe and effective way to keep your intimate area fresh and clean. Our spray is formulated to help restore and maintain the natural balance of your intimate area, which can be disrupted by various factors. Our probiotic-infused formula is gentle enough for daily use and free from harsh chemicals, dyes, parabens, and fragrances. Instead, we use natural ingredients like herbs, essential oils, and colloidal silver. Our Love Spray Body Oil 2 ounce is infused with a bend of essential oils known for their aphrodisiac properties, including Ylang-Ylang, Geranium, and Pomegranate. This body oil is formulated with a luxurious blend of oils to deeply moisturize and nourish your skin. The Love Spray Body Oil not only hydrates but also promotes a sense of relaxation and intimacy. Simply spritz the Love Spray onto your body or environment to create a romantic and sensual atmosphere. Use it as a mood enhancer during intimate moments with your partner, or as a way to pamper and indulge yourself. Apply the body oil after a shower or bath to lock in moisture and leave your skin feeling silky and smooth.
